name: Street Fighter: Scratch
description:
Welcome to Street Fighter: Scratch 

This is a Game Where Your Fight the CPU Person Every Update = New Charater or New Stage or Both

Easter Update is Coming Soon                                                                                                                           

Game Made By @CodingMode

Ryu: (A) = Shoyuken

(D) = Punch (W) = Jump Spin 

(S) = Kick

Ken: (A) = Spin (W) = Kick (D) = Shoyuken (S) Also Kick

My Scratch Game (Street Fighter: Scratch) From Logan! - YouTube Watch the Video!
